hero.title: Elegance that shows when you smile
hero.subtitle: Cutting-edge digital dentistry, where precision meets comfort and personalized care.

about.title: Dental care with design
about.blurb: Since 1999, we’ve combined technology and quality to make your smile look and feel better.
about.paragraph: Comprehensive clinic with all dental specialties. We are a Diamond Invisalign Clinic with an in-house lab to create precise, natural, and personalized digital smile designs.

services.title: Treatments
services.blurb: Orthodontics, rehabilitation, endodontics, pediatric dentistry, prosthodontics, periodontics.

implantes.title: Implants
implantes.desc: Fixed and aesthetic replacement of missing teeth.

limpieza.title: Dental cleaning
limpieza.desc: Professional prophylaxis to keep gums and teeth healthy.

coronas.title: Dental crowns
coronas.desc: Durable and natural restoration of damaged teeth.

resinas.title: Dental fillings
resinas.desc: Aesthetic, conservative restorations matching tooth color.

endodoncia.title: Endodontics
endodoncia.desc: Root canal treatments to preserve natural teeth.

periodoncia.title: Periodontics
periodoncia.desc: Comprehensive care for gums and bone support.

guarda_oclusal.title: Occlusal guard
guarda_oclusal.desc: Protection against bruxism and bite overload relief.

puentes.title: Oral rehabilitation
puentes.desc: Fixed solutions to replace one or more missing teeth.

alineadores.title: Aligners
alineadores.desc: Removable, discreet orthodontics to align your smile.

brackets.title: Braces
brackets.desc: Fixed orthodontics for bite correction and alignment.

blanqueamientos.title: Whitening
blanqueamientos.desc: Safe and effective lightening of tooth shade.

carillas.title: Veneers
carillas.desc: Aesthetic laminates for perfect shape and color.

selladores.title: Sealants
selladores.desc: Protect pits and fissures against cavities.

extracciones.title: Extractions
extracciones.desc: Simple and wisdom tooth extractions with a minimally invasive approach.

ortopedia.title: Orthopedics
ortopedia.desc: Guidance of maxillary and mandibular growth in young patients.

armonizacion_facial.title: Facial harmonization
armonizacion_facial.desc: Botox aesthetic procedure to enhance and balance facial features.

diseno_sonrisa.title: Smile design
diseno_sonrisa.desc: Comprehensive aesthetic plan for a harmonious, personalized smile.

implantes.subtitle: Fixed replacement with a natural-looking implant and crown.
bullets: Guided placement for greater precision and comfort.
Estimated time: surgery 60–90 min; integration 3–6 months.
Estimated price: $18,000–$35,000 MXN per implant (depending on case).

limpieza.subtitle: Professional prophylaxis to keep gums and teeth healthy.

coronas.subtitle: Durable and aesthetic restoration of damaged teeth.

maxilofacial.subtitle: Specialized surgical procedures with high precision.
bullets: Personalized surgical plan and pain control.

endodoncia.subtitle: Root canal treatment to preserve natural teeth.
bullets: Disinfection, shaping, and sealing of the canal.
Estimated price: $3,500–$6,500 MXN (molars may cost more).

periodoncia.subtitle: Comprehensive gum and bone support care.

guarda-oclusal.subtitle: Protection against bruxism and bite overload relief.
bullets: Estimated time: 2 visits of 20–30 min; delivery in 5–7 days.

puentes.subtitle: Fixed solutions for replacing one or more teeth.
bullets: Design and occlusal adjustment for stability.

alineadores.subtitle: Removable and discreet orthodontics to align your smile.
bullets: Estimated time: 6–18 months, check-ups every 6–8 weeks.

invisalign.subtitle: Invisible aligners with digital planning.
bullets: Comfort and precise control of treatment.

brackets.subtitle: Fixed orthodontics for bite correction and alignment.
bullets: Metal or aesthetic options (depending on case).

blanqueamientos.subtitle: Safe and effective whitening of tooth shade.

carillas.subtitle: Aesthetic laminates for perfect form and color.
bullets: Ceramic or composite with minimal preparation (depending on case).

limpieza-ninos.subtitle: Gentle and educational children’s cleaning.
bullets: Gentle cleaning, fluoride varnish, and hygiene tips.

selladores.subtitle: Protection of pits and fissures against cavities.

extracciones.subtitle: Simple and wisdom tooth extractions with a minimally invasive approach.

ortopedia.subtitle: Guidance of jaw growth in young patients.
bullets: Personalized functional appliances and regular check-ups.

armonizacion-facial.subtitle: Botulinum toxin and dermal fillers for natural facial balance.
bullets: Soft line reduction and subtle volume enhancement.
Estimated time: 20–40 min; results last 4–12 months.
Estimated price: $2,500–$4,500 MXN per area (toxin) / $4,500–$7,500 MXN per 1 ml (filler).

diseno-sonrisa.subtitle: Comprehensive aesthetic plan with digital mock-up and guided execution.
bullets: Clinical photography, proportion analysis, and test runs.
Estimated time: 1–3 visits for diagnosis and mock-up.
Estimated price: Study $1,500–$3,000 MXN; final treatment depending on plan ($10,000–$60,000 MXN).

default.subtitle: Personalized care according to your diagnosis.
bullets: Estimated price: to be quoted after evaluation.

slide1.title: Bracket-free orthodontics
slide1.textRight: worldwide for bracket-free orthodontic treatments from age 8+.

slide2.title: 3D guided treatment
slide2.textRight: with digital monitoring and personalized adjustments.

slide3.title: Clear aligners
slide3.textRight: without drastic changes to hygiene or diet.

follow.dc: Reach Dental City on social media.
follow.kids: Reach Dental City Kids & Family on social media.

msg.dc: Hi, I'd like to book an appointment at Dental City.
msg.kids: Hi, I'd like to book an appointment at Dental City Kids.

items.a: Yes, we offer pediatric dentistry with a friendly approach at Dental City Kids & Family.
Yes, and we also offer payment plans for selected treatments.

items.q: What does the first visit include?
items.a: Clinical assessment, any necessary studies, and a tailored treatment plan.
